Class Query

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the querying methods
    Author:

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getAttributes(Element... element)
      This method returns the attributes of the given element
      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Element>> khopNeighborhood(Vertex vertex, int k, java.lang.String... vertexLabels)
      This method returns the k-hop neighborhood of a given vertex, k being the number of levels to traverse The traversal happens in a depth first fashion.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Element>> pathQuery(java.lang.String queryPath)
      This method returns the set of paths satisfying the given query The paths are returned in the form Vertex-Edge-Vertex-Edge

      • khopNeighborhood

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Element>> khopNeighborhood(Vertex vertex,
                                                                 int k,
                                                                 java.lang.String... vertexLabels)
        This method returns the k-hop neighborhood of a given vertex, k being the number of levels to traverse The traversal happens in a depth first fashion. The user can also specify optional vertex types.
        Parameters:
        vertex - - the starting vertex
        k - - the number of hops
        edgeLabels - - optional list of vertex labels
        Returns:
